## 3. `.github/pull_request_template.md`

```markdown
### Description
Please include a summary of the changes and the related issue. List any dependencies that are required for this change.

Fixes # (issue)

### Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] This change requires a documentation update

### How Has This Been Tested?
Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes:

1. Test Scenario 1
   - Test configuration:
   - Test steps:
   - Expected result:
   - Actual result:

2. Test Scenario 2
   - Test configuration:
   - Test steps:
   - Expected result:
   - Actual result:

### Checklist:
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added logging messages for important operations
- [ ] I have added type hints for function parameters and return values

### Security Considerations:
- [ ] I have reviewed the code for potential security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have handled API errors appropriately
- [ ] I have ensured sensitive data is not exposed in logs

### Performance Considerations:
- [ ] I have reviewed the code for potential performance issues
- [ ] I have optimized database queries where possible
- [ ] I have added appropriate caching where beneficial

### Screenshots (if appropriate):
Add screenshots to help explain your changes.

### Additional Notes:
Any additional information that might be helpful for reviewers.
